bibl.title: The Figure of a Blind Man in the Light of Papyrological Evidence. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 1. The character of the evidence. - 2. Anonymity and social exclusion. - 3. Passivity of the blind. - 4. Low social status: a beggar. - There are three characteristics often associated with blind persons in the New Testament: anonymity, passivity and beggary. The aim of this study is to confront these characteristics with the evidence found in Greek papyri. - Avec résumé en anglais.
